description:
Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le rêve de Zeff et Sanji ! Le miracle de All Blue
Zeff and Sanji`s Dream! The Illusory All Blue!
Zeff to Sanji no Yume: Maboroshi no All Blue
Мечта Санджи и Зеффа. Сказочный Олл-Блу
حلم زيف وسانجي، الأزرق الكامل الوهميّ
ความฝันของเซฟและซันจิ!
ゼフとサンジの夢 幻のオールブルー
